pr_title: v4 fluent naming config, fix javadoc in non-string enum

timeline.message: fix missing javadoc for non-string enum
fix comment wordwrap in builder template

timeline.bodyText: SAS, XML, HTTP, JSON, API, URL, CPK, it seems there is Http and Json
timeline.author: ChenTanyi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,7 +19,12 @@ pipeline:
     flatten-models: true
     flatten-payloads: true
     naming:
-      preserve-uppercase-max-length: 4
+      override:
+        api: Api
+        cpk: Cpk
+        sas: Sas
+        url: Url
+        xml: Xml

replies.bodyText: I've deleted the preserve-uppercase-max-length: 4 line. So all 4 letter (or more) will be changed.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft
